attributes.action: make provision for HMCourts Service to provide transcripts of court cases free of charge to those involved in mental health care where the case concerns the defendant the healthcare/volunteer in mental health is concerned with
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently the Courts do not have provision for third parties involved in a defendants mental health care
to gain FREE access to a court transcript
or indeed any jury-bundle or court papers even with the defendants consent.
I feel that this is wrong and provision SHOULD be made to obtain free copy of court case transcripts to the third party.
